type.name: unknown
type.description: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.

type.name: boolean
type.description:
If `true`, the component is disabled.
The prop defaults to the value (`false`) inherited from the parent FormControl component.

type.name: boolean
type.description:
If `true`, the `input` will indicate an error by setting the `aria-invalid` attribute.
The prop defaults to the value (`false`) inherited from the parent FormControl component.

type.name: boolean
type.description:
If `true`, the `input` element is required.
The prop defaults to the value (`false`) inherited from the parent FormControl component.

type.name: boolean
type.description: If `true`, the component will be disabled.

type.name: boolean
type.description: If `true`, the `input` will indicate an error by setting the `aria-invalid` attribute.

type.name: <TOther extends Record<string, any> = {}>(externalProps?: TOther) => UseInputInputSlotProps<TOther>
type.description: Resolver for the input slot's props.

type.name: <TOther extends Record<string, any> = {}>(externalProps?: TOther) => UseInputRootSlotProps<TOther>
type.description: Resolver for the root slot's props.

type.name: boolean
type.description: If `true`, the `input` will indicate that it's required.
